typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Prop_0 as string,
		REGION as string,
		YEAR as string,
		MONTH_RPTD as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_MURDER as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_MANSLAUGHTER as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_RAPE_TOTAL as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_F_RAPE as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_A_RAPE as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ROBBERY_TOTAL as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_G_ROB as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_K_ROB as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_O_ROB as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_SA_ROB as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ASSAULT_TOTAL as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_G_ASSAULT as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_K_ASSAULT as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_O_ASSAULT as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_HF_ASSAULT as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_S_ASSAULT as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_BURGLARY_TOTAL as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_FORCE_ENTRY as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ENTRYNF as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ATT_BURGLARY as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_LARCENY_TOT as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_MVT_TOTAL as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_AUTO_THEFT as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_TRUCK_BUS_THEFT as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_O_MVT as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ALL_FIELDS as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_VIOLENT as string,
		ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_PROPERTY as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ClearanceDataSourdce
cleansedData derive(Violent = round((case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_VIOLENT) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_VIOLENT) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_VIOLENT))) * 100) , 2),
		AggravatedAssault = round((case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ASSAULT_TOTAL) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ASSAULT_TOTAL) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ASSAULT_TOTAL))) * 100), 2),
		Homicide = round((case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_MURDER) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_MURDER) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_MURDER))) * 100), 2),
		Rape = round((case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_RAPE_TOTAL) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_RAPE_TOTAL) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_RAPE_TOTAL))) * 100) , 2),
		Robbery = round((case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ROBBERY_TOTAL) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ROBBERY_TOTAL) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ROBBERY_TOTAL))) * 100), 2),
		Property = round((case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_PROPERTY) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_PROPERTY) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_PROPERTY))) * 100), 2),
		Burglary = round((case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_BURGLARY_TOTAL) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_BURGLARY_TOTAL) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_BURGLARY_TOTAL))) * 100), 2),
		Assault = round((case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ASSAULT_TOTAL) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ASSAULT_TOTAL) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ASSAULT_TOTAL))) * 100) , 2),
		Larceny = round((case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_LARCENY_TOT) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_LARCENY_TOT) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_LARCENY_TOT))) * 100) , 2),
		MotorVehicleTheft = round((case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_MVT_TOTAL) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_MVT_TOTAL) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_MVT_TOTAL))) * 100) , 2),
		MonthsReported = round((case(lower(MONTH_RPTD) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(MONTH_RPTD) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(MONTH_RPTD)))), 2),
		YEAR_INT = case(lower(YEAR) == 'na', 0, case(toInteger(YEAR) < 0 , 0, toInteger(YEAR))),
		PARTI = round(((case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_VIOLENT) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_VIOLENT) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_VIOLENT))) * 100 +
case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ASSAULT_TOTAL) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ASSAULT_TOTAL) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ASSAULT_TOTAL)))  * 100 +
case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_MURDER) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_MURDER) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_MURDER)))  * 100 +
case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_RAPE_TOTAL) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_RAPE_TOTAL) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_RAPE_TOTAL)))  * 100 +
case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ROBBERY_TOTAL) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ROBBERY_TOTAL) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ROBBERY_TOTAL)))  * 100 +
case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_PROPERTY) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_PROPERTY) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_PROPERTY)))  * 100 +
case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_BURGLARY_TOTAL) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_BURGLARY_TOTAL) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_BURGLARY_TOTAL)))  * 100 +
case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ASSAULT_TOTAL) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ASSAULT_TOTAL) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_ASSAULT_TOTAL)))  * 100 +
case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_LARCENY_TOT) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_LARCENY_TOT) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_LARCENY_TOT)))  * 100 +
case(lower(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_MVT_TOTAL) == 'na', 0.0, case(toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_MVT_TOTAL) < 0 , 0.0, toFloat(ANNUAL_CLEARANCE_RATE_MVT_TOTAL)))  * 100 
) / 10), 2),
		AreaID = iif(lower(REGION) == 'northeast', 2, iif(lower(REGION) == 'midwest', 3, iif(lower(REGION) == 'south', 4, 5))),
		AreaTypeId = 2,
		ORI = "",
		FIPS = "") ~> CorrectNAs
ClearanceDataSourdce filter(YEAR != 'NA' || YEAR != 'na' || YEAR != '0' || YEAR != '' || REGION !='' || REGION != 'NA' || REGION !='na') ~> cleansedData
CorrectNAs sink(input(
		Year as integer,
		AreaId as integer,
		AreaTypeId as integer,
		ORI7 as string,
		Fips as integer,
		PartI as double,
		Violent as double,
		AggravatedAssault as double,
		Homicide as double,
		Rape as double,
		Robbery as double,
		Property as double,
		Burglary as double,
		Larceny as double,
		MotorVehicleTheft as double,
		MonthsReported as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Year = YEAR_INT,
		AreaId = AreaID,
		AreaTypeId,
		ORI7 = ORI,
		Fips = FIPS,
		PartI = PARTI,
		Violent,
		AggravatedAssault,
		Homicide,
		Rape,
		Robbery,
		Property,
		Burglary,
		Larceny,
		MotorVehicleTheft,
		MonthsReported
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> ClearanceDestinationDataset
